sentence: Finally has cell phone service on their ballroom level which is a plus
The hotel staff is very great and professional to work with from the catering manager Joseph to the banquet and A V staff
The hotel has a beautiful atrium with down stairs restaurant and bar
Tirsit and Elsa along with Riad and Mario were a great help to me during my meeting
Definitely recommend this hotel for business meeting
I can not say enough good things about Riad the banquet captain and how special and welcome he made us feel the entire weekend
Hotel is centrally located and was around the corner from my business meeting which was a bonus
Convention Hotel that Delivers
I live in Denver and needed to get her into a safe location in the event she got stranded or lost power
I was moved to another hotel 15 miles away from conference site
I usually try to stay closer to DC but all the hotels were full convention graduation season
Stayed for 2 nights while speaking at the conference
The conference was great but really poor planning for construction during a conference
Other than the cold in the foyer due to the renovations our stay was excellent
I have stayed here many times for a yearly conference and have always felt that I was in a warm somewhat luxurious hotel
Lots of improvements made to sleeping rooms fitness center and meeting space
I just returned from a four day meeting at the Bethesda Hyat Regency
It was a horrible week horrible hotel experience and I have begun the conversation with those responsible for the yearly convention to look at other options for next year
We had a miserable time at a 3day Conference there
The room temperature in our room was set at 65 and was very comfortable but once you left your room you felt the heat in the Atrium
The cell reception was not great during the conference but other than that the experience was great as expected
Kind of a pain when you are at a conference and want that morning coffee and not running into other conference attendees half awake
Party on main floor of atrium hotel after 10 pm offensive sound up to floor 9
Save yourself the headache heartache and grief and do not book this hotel for your event
Although the hotel look great there was a conference in the hotel
The arrangement of rooms around a towering atrium can be loud when the hotel is crowded but was quiet on our second stay when hotel was less full
The downstairs ballrooms were freezing
I was there for a conference but when I did take a break to walk around one of the gentleman in the restaurant did I asked me if I was okay and do to help which was nice
Every wedding party every group of late night drinkers every meeting of conference attendees had a built in megaphone as the atrium blasted their noise up through the hotel levels
